mapper.select: select t.username, t.password, t.cnname, t.enabled from s_user t where t.username=#{username}
select b.code from s_user a,s_role b ,s_user_role c where a.username=#{username} and a.userid=c.userid and b.roleid=c.roleid

select distinct d.code from s_user a,s_role b ,s_user_role c,s_permission d ,s_role_permission e where a.username=#{username} and a.userid=c.userid and b.roleid=c.roleid and b.roleid=e.roleid and d.permissionid=e.permissionid union select distinct c.code from s_user a, s_user_permission b, s_permission c where a.username =#{username} and a.userid = b.userid and c.permissionid=b.permissionid
